name: Into the Mines (Hugison)
description:
This is a game made for Ludum Dare 48 in 3 days!

You have to go deeper into the mines as fast as pssible without crashing your Minecart. Gravity is your only friend to gain speed. You can just slow down and rotate the Cart. “Glück auf!” or “Best of luck!”

Since I did not have the time to make a proper tutorial, here is how to play: 

  • Slow down: Space
  • Rotate Cart: A/D
  • Restart/Self Destruct: Enter
  • Restart from the beginning with new timer:  N

The Timer takes the time for the whole run (including reloads at checkpoints).

My own best time: 2:3.09

Everything you see and hear in the game is made by myself during the jam.

Changelog:

  • Fixed a bug that the timer would not work correctly when blown up by dynamite. Timer works correctly now.
  • Fixed the restart comletely. You can now correctly restart from the beginning with fresh timer.
  • Updated path for 3rd dynamite cart so it doesn’s get stuck anymore.
